item.description:
Interested in a gathering of the Geeks?

Join me at BarCampBoston + http://barcamp.org/Ba... +

BarCamp will start at 10am on Saturday, June 3 and end at 6pm on Sunday, June 4. BarCamp will be held at Monster Worldwide, Clocktower Place, Maynard, MA 01754

I'm not the organizer of this Event. But I thought many of you might be interested. I see some very interesting names on the participant list (Ray Deck, Gregor Rothfuss, Pito Salas, Caroline Meek, ... YOU?)

See you there or at next Meetup

Kaj Kandler

Please also enter yourself in the participant list of the BarCampBoston at + http://barcamp.org/Ba... + and also consider to contribute a session, discussion, lightning-talk or demo of what you are hacking on.

For more information, see http://barcamp.org/Ba...
item.name: BarCamp Boston
